original_text: You shall take the atonement money from the people of Israel and shall give it for the service of the tent of meeting, that it may bring the people of Israel to remembrance before the Lord, so as to make atonement for your lives.”
korean_text: 너는 이스라엘 자손에게서 속전을 취하여 회막 봉사에 쓰라 이것이 여호와 앞에서 이스라엘 자손의 기념이 되어서 너희의 생명을 대속하리라

sentences.original_text: You shall take the atonement money from the people of Israel
and shall give it for the service of the tent of meeting
that it may bring the people of Israel to remembrance before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 이스라엘 백성을 여호와 앞에서 기억하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: so as to make atonement for your lives.
